Sources¶

During our work, we found help on many different places.

For the package structure¶

    • the package chaoseverywhere built by some of our predecessors

    • this python-guide about packages

For the code part¶

    • the documentation of all the packages that figure in the requirement.txt in our GitHub account.

    • the public platform stackoverflow was very helpful.

For the data¶

All the datasets that we used are taken from data.gouv.fr.
